name: PM-KISAN (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi)
benefits: ₹6,000 per year in three equal installments of ₹2,000 each, directly to bank account.
apply_steps: Register with Aadhaar, land records, and bank details

name: PM Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
short: Crop insurance at very low premium
benefits: Comprehensive crop insurance against natural calamities, pests, and diseases. Premium: 2% for Kharif, 1.5% for Rabi, 5% for commercial/horticultural crops.
apply_steps: Apply through your bank (if loanee farmer, auto-enrolled)
Submit crop sowing certificate and land records

name: Kisan Credit Card (KCC)
short: Low-interest farm loans up to ₹3 lakh
benefits: Short-term credit at 4% interest (with subvention). Credit limit based on land holding and crop. Includes personal accident insurance cover of ₹50,000.
apply_steps: Visit any commercial bank, cooperative, or RRB
Submit Aadhaar, land records, and passport photo
Credit limit sanctioned based on land and crop pattern

name: Soil Health Card Scheme
benefits: Free soil testing every 2 years. Crop-wise fertilizer recommendations. Helps reduce input costs by 10-15%.
apply_steps: Soil sample collected from your field
Card issued with nutrient status and recommendations

name: PM Krishi Sinchai Yojana (PMKSY)
benefits: 55-75% subsidy on drip and sprinkler irrigation systems. Per Drop More Crop component saves 30-40% water.
apply_steps: Get system installed and claim subsidy

name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
benefits: ₹50,000 per hectare over 3 years for organic farming adoption. Includes certification, inputs, and marketing support.
apply_steps: Form a cluster of 50+ farmers (20 ha minimum)

name: Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanization (SMAM)
benefits: 40-80% subsidy on purchase of tractors, tillers, harvesters, and other farm equipment. Higher subsidy for SC/ST/small farmers.
apply_steps: Purchase and submit bills for subsidy reimbursement

name: National Food Security Mission (NFSM)
short: Free/subsidized seeds & training for food crops
benefits: Subsidized/free improved seeds, subsidized inputs, training and demonstrations for rice, wheat, pulses, coarse cereals, and nutri-cereals.
apply_steps: Receive seeds and inputs at subsidized rates

name: National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA)
benefits: Support for rainfed areas, water management, soil health. Includes climate change adaptation strategies and agroforestry promotion.
apply_steps: Participate in watershed/rainfed area development projects

name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana (RKVY-RAFTAAR)
benefits: Project-based grants for agri-infrastructure, value chain development, and agripreneurship. Up to ₹25 lakh for agri-startups.
apply_steps: Submit project proposal through state agriculture department
For startups: apply to RKVY-RAFTAAR innovation fund

name: Mission for Integrated Development of Horticulture (MIDH)
short: Subsidy for fruit, vegetable & flower farming
benefits: 40-75% subsidy on setting up polyhouses, shade nets, nurseries. Financial support for fruit/vegetable cultivation, beekeeping, and mushroom farming.

name: PM Kisan Maan Dhan Yojana
benefits: ₹3,000 per month pension after age 60. Government matches farmer's monthly contribution (₹55-200 based on entry age).
apply_steps: Visit nearest CSC with Aadhaar and bank details
Choose monthly contribution based on age

name: Agriculture Infrastructure Fund (AIF)
short: ₹2 crore loan at 3% interest for agri-infra
benefits: Loans up to ₹2 crore at 3% interest subvention for post-harvest infrastructure — cold storage, warehouses, grading/sorting units.
apply_steps: Get loan sanctioned through empaneled banks

name: e-NAM (National Agriculture Market)
short: Online trading platform — better market prices
benefits: Sell produce online to buyers across India. Transparent bidding, better prices, and direct payment to bank account.
apply_steps: Upload produce details and quality parameters
Accept best bid and get paid directly

name: Mahila Kisan Sashaktikaran Pariyojana (MKSP)
benefits: Training, skill development, and resources for women farmers. Covers organic farming, livestock, and non-timber forest produce.
apply_steps: Form or join a Self-Help Group (SHG)

name: Mukhyamantri Krishi Ashirwad Yojana
benefits: ₹5,000 per acre per year, maximum ₹25,000 for up to 5 acres.
apply_steps: Verify details through local agriculture office
Amount credited directly to bank account

name: Rythu Bandhu
benefits: ₹5,000 per acre per season for purchasing seeds, fertilizers, and other inputs.
apply_steps: Auto-enrolled based on land ownership records
Cheque/transfer issued before each crop season

name: KALIA (Krushak Assistance for Livelihood and Income Augmentation)
benefits: ₹25,000 per farm family over five seasons. Also covers landless agricultural households with ₹12,500.
apply_steps: Apply via Gram Panchayat or KALIA portal

name: YSR Rythu Bharosa
benefits: ₹13,500 per year (₹7,500 from state + ₹6,000 from PM-KISAN) for investment support before Kharif season.
apply_steps: Verify Aadhaar linkage at village secretariat

name: Bhavantar Bhugtan Yojana
benefits: If market price falls below MSP, government pays the difference directly to farmers. Covers soybean, maize, moong, urad, groundnut, etc.
apply_steps: Register crop and acreage on e-Uparjan portal
Price difference credited to bank account

name: National Mission on Agricultural Extension & Technology
benefits: Free farmer training through KVKs and ATMAs. Technology demonstrations on farmer fields. Access to latest crop techniques.
apply_steps: Attend training programs and field demonstrations
Get crop advisories via Kisan Call Centre (1800-180-1551)

name: National Animal Disease Control Programme
short: Free FMD & Brucellosis vaccination for cattle
benefits: 100% free vaccination for Foot & Mouth Disease (FMD) and Brucellosis for all cattle and buffalo.
apply_steps: Ensure all animals are tagged and vaccinated

name: PM Jeevan Jyoti Bima / Suraksha Bima (for farmers)
benefits: PMJJBY: ₹2 lakh life cover at ₹436/year. PMSBY: ₹2 lakh accident cover at ₹20/year. Both auto-debit from bank.
apply_steps: Nominee receives ₹2 lakh in case of death/accident

name: MGNREGA (100-Day Employment Guarantee)
benefits: 100 days of guaranteed wage employment per household per year. Rural infrastructure creation — farm ponds, wells, roads.
apply_steps: Apply for Job Card at Gram Panchayat
Wages paid within 15 days (daily rates vary by state)

name: Micro Irrigation Fund (MIF)
short: Dedicated fund for state micro-irrigation projects
benefits: ₹5,000 crore corpus with NABARD for state-level micro-irrigation projects. Facilitates faster adoption of drip/sprinkler at subsidized rates.
